hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #a Piece of the Triforce# and #a Piece of the Triforce#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest
Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Deku Tree#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: Why won't anyone acknowledge the housing crisis in Kakariko Village?

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: Did you know that in the Forest Temple you can reach the alcove in the block push room with Hover Boots?
